CustomField.description: GS Purpose: The total score of all scoring criteria's for an expansion city record.
CustomField.formula: Per_Capita_Income_Score__c + Median_Household_Income_Score__c + City_Population_Score__c + Metro_Population_Score__c + Diversity_of_Population_POC_Score__c + Top_50_University_Score__c + Walkability_Score_Score__c + Transit_Score_Score__c + Major_Airport_Score__c + Distance_From_Nearest_Top_10_Metro_Score__c + Level_Of_Tech_Activity_Score__c + Non_Traditional_Tech_Educator_Score__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Scores of 10 or higher are a "Go." Max score is 15.75
CustomField.label: Bitwise Match Score
